name: Radish Gazpacho
recipeIngredient:
1/4 teaspoon
Worcestershire sauce and water
as needed

recipeInstructions.text:
Combine 1 pound chopped tomatoes, 1 pound of chopped radishes with 1 peeled and diced
cucumber,1/4 cup olive oil, 1 slice day-old bread, few chopped scallions, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1/4 teaspoon worcestershire sauce and water in a food processor or blender; process
until chunky-smooth
